attributes.action: take action to address Family Law revision to ensure sexual equality in all aspects of it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Family Law in The British Isles, & all other so-called civilized countries, continues to be biased in favour of the female sex. This bias is evident in all aspects of this 'law' system. It is not only where children are concerned, but applies across the whole spectrum of marital problems.
It is long overdue for changes to be made in The Family Law system.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
